Articles.Content:
Hi!

I'm going to stream KSP this night, it's my first stream, and my first post, so i dont know if this is the right place or i'm missing some forum rule.

I'm playing career and i made trips to Duna, Ike, and Gilly, (and return) and put probes on surface of Eve and orbit of Jool.

Come to see more!!

The Link: [http://www.twitch.tv/koskar60](http://www.twitch.tv/koskar60)

Starting at 00:00

P.D sorry for my english i dont talk English often.
